extendedInfo.description: Making your everyday banking easy and convenient is important to us. Desert Schoolsâ Mobile Banking app will allow you to do your banking anytime or anywhere. Youâll have the convenient features of Online Banking packaged into your own secure mobile bank. Check your balances while youâre shopping, transfer money on vacation, pay a bill waiting in your doctorâs office, or deposit a check from the comfort of your home â itâs all possible wherever you are, whenever you want with our Mobile Banking app.  By downloading this app, you accept our Mobile Banking Terms and Conditions, which can be viewed at desertschools.org/mobileterms.  â¢ Check account balances â¢ View transaction history â¢ Transfer funds â¢ Pay bills â¢ Deposit checks â¢ Manage alerts â¢ Find ATM and branch locationYour security is one of our highest priorities at Desert Schools. We use state-of-the-art technologies to prevent unauthorized users from accessing your accounts. We will never transmit your account number and no secure data will ever be stored in your phone. To enhance security, you will log in to Mobile Banking each time you access your account. Never store your log in information within your mobile device. To learn more about our commitment to security, visit desertschools.org/security.To take advantage of the features of Mobile Banking, log into Online Banking at desertschools.org and visit the Mobile Banking tab. Your Online Banking username and password will also be used to access Mobile Banking. For more information about Mobile Banking, visit desertschools.org/mobile.Desert Schools is federally insured by the NCUA.

reviews.title: Great except for deposit feature
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using the app for several months now and find it useful and simple to navigate. It would be useful if other Desert Schools\' member accounts that are linked with my accounts could receive transfers as on the website. The  app only allows transfers betwee my own accounts. Also, the deposit feature is buggy; as soon as I take a picture of my check, the app completely closes and returns me to my phone\'s home screen as if I exited the app myself. It has done this consistently. Fix please!
reviews.author: Sommer Jones

reviews.title: Solid, But desperately needs a facelift!
reviews.comment: The app in itself is solid and does everything I need it to from a mobile banking standpoint. Check balances and transfer money. I do not use the deposit function so I can not comment on that. This app desperately needs to be updated with a whole new UI though, this looks terrible and just in general offers a very low quality experience to the user and makes it seem like DS does not care about this app. Google\'s new Holo UI is amazing and this seriously needs to be updated with the current guidelines. Please look into this.
reviews.author: Bryce Mrozinski

reviews.title: Keeps closing when I try to use the deposit setting
reviews.comment: Everytime I try to deposit a check, the app closes down during the picture trying part.  It completely logs me out and goes to my home screen.  Very irritating. Also tried uninstalling then reinstalling that did not help. Please fix!
reviews.author: patricia barnes

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Does everything I need so I don\'t have to go into the bank. :)
reviews.author: Olivia Moll

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Does what I need it to!!
reviews.author: James Robles

reviews.title: ... The best
reviews.comment: This is the best app ever as far as mobile banking is concerned concern
reviews.author: terrence coker

reviews.title: Account list is blank
reviews.comment: Freezes up. Shows blank account list. Very slow. This is the worst app ever. Even when it worked it was terrible. Could only use one login. Mobile deposit has a delay and a weekly limit. Switching to Arizona federal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update needed
reviews.comment: Please support the nexus 7
reviews.author: David Higham

reviews.title: Worst app ever!!!!!
reviews.comment: You can only be under one moblie number it won\'t let you work with multiple numbers. What a pain in the butt!!! The year is 2013 where us the technology!!!
reviews.author: joel leaverton

reviews.title: Samsung Note
reviews.comment: Will not let me deposit my checks on my phone, my wife has Galaxy S3 n it works fine on hers but not on Now , I hate it that I can\'t do it on my phone.
reviews.author: JOSE NAPOLEZ

reviews.title: Good for most
reviews.comment: Glad we have an app but they need to extend the history of how far back you can look. A search feature would be nice. I dont like when I have to switch to the web version.
reviews.author: Kyle Karges

reviews.title: Not working..
reviews.comment: I use to use this all the time and recently it hasn\'t even been letting me log in.... I\'ve tried re-installing it a couple of times but it still hasn\'t worked like before... Please fix! It was perfect before! :(
reviews.author: rebecca gutierrez

reviews.comment: Ok after mobile bank has been out for years already. Finally they get with program.\tIt nice they finally got mobile banking 2 years  after everyone else. The app was nice n all of sudden cant deposit checks anymore. As soon as take picture my phone returns to home screen. Its bs.
reviews.author: Alec Simzyk

reviews.comment: Get in and it says log out....useless waste of time..nothing works with DFCU....doesn\'t even accept a cash deposit at teller machine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Some things missing
reviews.comment: This is a great app for banking; updates frequently and fast. Had some issues using the mobile check deposit. Personally, I have never really liked that feature of banking. The one thing I wish it had was the ability to see pending transactions/holds on mobile, like a pending tab within each account like on your web page. Also, support for tablet. I don\'t see why accounts couldn\'t be synced using email address too...
reviews.author: Michael Cleveland

reviews.title: Not 100%  useful
reviews.comment: Check deposit never works
reviews.author: Justine Bibb

reviews.title: log-in Username Error
reviews.comment: when i enter my account #, it tells me thats incorrect, so i cant even use the app. please fix!!!
reviews.author: Tony Meza Jr

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Thank you dessert schools
reviews.author: maria garcia

reviews.title: Not Satisfactory
reviews.comment: Transactions are not processed with the same speed as on their website.  Encountered a two day delay for a simple transfer on the weekend.  Website posts it immediately.  Cannot process check deposits as as app malfunctions during the imaging steps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does it work on Gingerbread?
reviews.comment: Works great on my Jellybean tablet, but won\'t install on my Gingerbread phone.  App details says it\'s for Android 2.1+.  If I can get it on my phone, it\'s 5*
reviews.author: Derek Rose
